message:
SYSTEM: Muppets_2-_Language_Models.pptx: Diapositiva {22}
15% of tokens in the input are Masked
80% replaced with [MASK]
10% with a random Word
10% with the original Word 

Why?
100% of Mask tokens -> the model is only optimized for masked words
90% of mask and 10% of random -> the observation is never correct
90% of mask and 10% of original -> the model copy the original embedding
speaker: SYSTEM
